News.headline: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Chester
News.page_title: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Chester
News.URL_keywords: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Chester
News.short_description: Tickets for the Daggers home clash against Chester FC are now on sale.
News.description:
Chester visit The Chigwell Construction Stadium on Saturday 21st January, with a 15:00pm kick off. 

Ticket prices can be found here. Under-10s are FREE if purchased in advance of matchday with an adult equivalent.

Individual tickets can also be purchased on-line, on the phone and in the club shop. 

Purchase:
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21   
Club shop: Opening Times
